item.title: Reading NFC Card ID on Ubuntu
item.description: Prerequisites Install driver My device is ACS122U : http://www.acs.com.hk/en/products/3/acr122u-usb-nfc-reader/#tab_downloads Kernel modules # echo "uinput" >> /etc/modules # echo "install nfc /bin/false" >> /etc/modprobe.

item.title: Read Input Data From USB Devices in Linux
item.description: Introduction You just bought a new input device like barcode scanner, proximity card reader with USB port.
